channel.title: How would i add a command in silab
channel.description: how would i add a command in silab that gives me max money?

item.title: How would i add a command in silab
item.dc:creator: @adamator5 adamator5
item.description:
@adamator5 wrote:

To add a silabs item, obviously, ur server needs to be siilabs lolz, so u find out the silab item code,ill give you one of my commands just to help you…
if (command.startsWith(“silab”) && playerRights >= 0) {
addItem(15352,1);
addItem(15195,1);
addItem(15185,1);
addItem(15156,1);
}
add that with the rest of your commands and then compile
then run the server again and type in ::silab
and that shud giv u d full helm, d bow, d boots and somat else, i forgot lolz, hope u like, if you need any other commands like, skillcapes, just ask me, ill do what i can :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 18, 2008, 05:52:08 PM[/size][hr]and if you want max money, the one that he give you is not the max, the max is
well… just add this command instead
if (command.startsWith(“silab”) && playerRights >= 0) {
addItem(995,2147000000);
}
thats the max money for silabs, 999m is the max money for a moparscape server, and when u make a money command, you dont put the item as the actual silab code (00995)
you just put the actual numbers, if you know what i mean,
(995) not (00995) or mopar one (0995) just the numbers 0+
hope you like my info.
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 18, 2008, 05:58:04 PM[/size][hr]and if u wanna make it admin or mod to be able to type it…
if (command.startsWith(“silab”) && playerRights >= 0) {
addItem(995,2147000000);
}
you change the player rights to… for example for mod u wud put
if (command.startsWith(“silab”) && playerRights >= 1) {
addItem(995,2147000000);
}
and for admin
if (command.startsWith(“silab”) && playerRights >= 3) {
addItem(995,2147000000);
}
and if you want to make it a personal command type,
if (command.startsWith(“silab”) && (playerRights >= 2 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase (“bacus23”))) {
addItem(995,2147000000);
}
agen, hope u like my info

Read full topic

item.title: How would i add a command in silab
item.dc:creator: @Reforced _Reforced
item.description:
@Reforced wrote:

open client.java and add this in your command method.

if (command.startsWith("money") && playerRights >= 0) { addItem(995, 999999999); }

change “money” to watever you want …

Read full topic
